main.se450.factories

Class ShapeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.factories.ShapeFactory

  • public class ShapeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The ShapeFactory is a factory design class that allows the application to produce different shapes. The ShapeFactory class is designed to create a less cohesive model and allows a more decoubled design.
    Author:
    anthonyfruende

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IShape makeShape(java.lang.String type, float left, float top, float right, float bottom, float x, float y, float rotation, int color, main.se450.interfaces.IStrategy iStrategy)
      This makeShape(...) method creates an instance of a shape casted to IShape.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • makeShape

        public static IShape makeShape(java.lang.String type,
                               float left,
                               float top,
                               float right,
                               float bottom,
                               float x,
                               float y,
                               float rotation,
                               int color,
                               main.se450.interfaces.IStrategy iStrategy)
                        throws BadShapeException
        This makeShape(...) method creates an instance of a shape casted to IShape. This method creates the following shapes:

        • Circle
        • Square
        • Line
        • Triangle
        • Ship
        Parameters:
        type - represents the shape to be created
        left - represents the left-most point on the shape
        top - represents the top-most point on the shape
        right - represents the right-most point on the shape
        bottom - represents the bottom-most point on the shape
        x - represents the direction the shape is moving on the x axis
        y - represents the direction the shape is moving on the y axis
        rotation - represents the rotations speed on the z axis
        color - represents the color of the shape
        iStrategy - represents the strategy used when the shape approaches the end of the window
        Returns:
        returns a shape of type IShape
        Throws:
        BadShapeException - throws exception if the type is an invalid entry and is not one of the shapes listed above.
        See Also:
        BadShapeException
